statements: SELECT * FROM employee_skills;
SELECT name, skill_set FROM employee_skills;
SELECT employee_id, project_assignment FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_set = 'Java';
SELECT * FROM employee_skills WHERE project_assignment = 'Project X' AND skill_set = 'Python';
SELECT name, skill_set, project_assignment FROM employee_skills ORDER BY name DESC, skill_set ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, skill_set, project_assignment FROM employee_skills WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT name, skill_set FROM employee_skills WHERE project_assignment = 'Project A';
SELECT * FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_set LIKE '%Java%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, project_assignment FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_set IN ('Java', 'Python') ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT project_assignment FROM employee_skills WHERE name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY project_assignment DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSkills;
SELECT employee_id, skill, proficiency FROM EmployeeSkills WHERE proficiency > 3;
SELECT skill, COUNT(*) AS skill_count FROM EmployeeSkills GROUP BY skill;
SELECT * FROM ProjectAssignments WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_id, employee_id, MIN(start_date) AS start_date FROM ProjectAssignments GROUP BY project_id, employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSkills WHERE proficiency >= 4 ORDER BY proficiency DESC, skill ASC
SELECT employee_id, skill, proficiency FROM EmployeeSkills WHERE skill = 'SQL' ORDER BY proficiency DESC
SELECT project_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS num_employees_assigned FROM ProjectAssignments GROUP BY project_id HAVING COUNT(employee_id) > 3 ORDER BY num_employees_assigned DESC
SELECT MAX(proficiency) AS max_proficiency FROM EmployeeSkills
SELECT * FROM ProjectAssignments WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date IS NULL ORDER BY project_id
SELECT * FROM employee_skills;
SELECT employee_id, skill, proficiency FROM employee_skills WHERE proficiency > 2;
SELECT employee_id, skill, proficiency FROM employee_skills ORDER BY proficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_assignments WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_id, e.skill, t.project_id FROM employee_skills e INNER JOIN team_allocation t ON e.employee_id = t.project_id;
SELECT employee_id, skill FROM employee_skills WHERE proficiency > 5 ORDER BY skill ASC
SELECT project_id, employee_id, start_date, end_date FROM project_assignments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT team_id, project_id, allocated_hours FROM team_allocation WHERE allocated_hours BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY project_id ASC
SELECT employee_id, skill, proficiency FROM employee_skills WHERE skill = 'Programming' OR skill = 'Design' ORDER BY proficiency DESC, employee_id ASC
SELECT project_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM project_assignments GROUP BY project_id HAVING employee_count >= 3 ORDER BY employee_count DESC, project_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT employee_id, project_id, assignment_date FROM employee_projects WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, skill_set FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT e.employee_name, p.project_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id JOIN projects p ON ep.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT t.team_name, COUNT(ep.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM team_allocation t LEFT JOIN employee_projects ep ON t.team_id = ep.project_id GROUP BY t.team_name;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, skill_set FROM Employee;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Project;
SELECT employee_id, project_id, start_date, end_date FROM EmployeeProject;
SELECT employee_id, skill_id, proficiency_level FROM EmployeeSkill;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, skill_set FROM Employee;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM Project;
SELECT employee_id, project_id, start_date, end_date FROM EmployeeProject;
SELECT * FROM Skill;
